column5: Send me a PM and I'll give you more info. It's related to the insurance industry.  "We have an immediate career opportunity for a highly motivated individual to assume the role of Administrative Assistant in a fast-paced team environment. Our ideal candidate will have exceptional interpersonal skills, with the ability to communicate effectively with both internal and external contacts; be customer focused, and have superior organizational and time management skills. You will have strong administrative skills to support a team of adjusters and be able to work with minimal supervision, and have proven computer skills with experience in Microsoft Office. Experience in the insurance industry would be a definte asset."
